chasm.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a very deep space between two areas of rock or ice, especially one that is dangerous
chasm.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: a rope bridge across the chasm
chasm.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a big difference between two people, groups, or things
chasm.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: the chasm between rich and poor
